short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learnitive is an AI-powered writing tool that helps you create awesome scholarly content!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learnitive is an AI-powered interactive writing tool for academics, copywriters and education agencies.

This version of Learnitive is designed to provide support for Google docs, Office365, LaTex Overleaf, etc. It can generate awesome AI content on the fly, correct grammar, spelling, vocabulary, punctuation, style, phrasing, and more - all taking context (input) into account.

Learnitive allows to create AI content based on four AI models: fast, balanced, strong and expert. It allows to generate high-quality and structured content that is fluent and original.

Note that English is the only supported language (to feature Copyscape) and violence, hate speeches, or adult contents cannot be generated. It is designed to be used for education, research, and SEO marketing purposes only.

Learnitive helps to create engaging content thatâ€™s accurate and fluent, and hence can improve engagement, growth, and success.

Get your free Learnitive API key today and start creating AI contents with this awesome Chrome extension!
